# BLAS

> Standard library basic linear algebra subroutines (BLAS).


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var blas = require( '@stdlib/blas' );
```

#### blas

Standard library basic linear algebra subroutines (BLAS).

``` javascript
var o = blas;
// returns {...}
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better examples -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var blas = require( '@stdlib/blas' );

console.log( getKeys( blas ) );
```
